## About

I'm an ML researcher, interested in ensuring that AI progress is broadly beneficial---both by minimising AI-induced harms, and ensuring that the benefits are shared outside of the privileged few.

I'm currently working within the UK government, developing auditing frameworks for LLM agents at the [UK's AI Safety Institute](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/ai-safety-institute-overview/introducing-the-ai-safety-institute). Previously I worked at the [Center for AI Safety](https://www.safe.ai/), was a research intern at [UC Berkeley](https://humancompatible.ai/), studied LLM generalization under [Owain Evans](https://owainevans.github.io/) and completed my CS undergrad at the [University of Cambridge](https://www.undergraduate.study.cam.ac.uk/courses/computer-science).
